saf.core.ui

Class DefaultSAFDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • saf.core.ui.DefaultSAFDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISAFDisplay

    public class DefaultSAFDisplay
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISAFDisplay
    Default implementation of an ISAFDisplay that uses the DockingFrames library for its docking behavior.
    Author:
    Nick Collier
